topic.title: Nurse passes out on live interview after gettings the vaccination

1606040168_1AkCd6161a4erMEbe4998aX7Hnpd2.body:
What about setting up the local server on a raspberry pi and forwarding your local IP to your iPhone so when you type 192.168.0.14 (your raspberry pi) it will bring up the local host server. Then if you want to take it globally you can then just use a VPN to stay connected to your home wifi using wireguard or OPENVPN. 


Just throwing in my two cents

1607730992_1MUqNCPTZnz9R3c39yWSQesf3gwbC.body:
I may not be correct but from the looks of it, more and more people are starting to not buy into the bullshit. Even the average joe is starting to question the rush and forcefulness and irational rules. I say the goal is to hit 51% of those that believe C19 was a scam the rest of the 49% will be neutralized by the time we cross the 51% mark. 

Maybe I'm just the optimistic type but it seems more people have woken up than ever since the start...
